Title: Linquid
Description:
Linquid is a functional GUI library for .NET 3.5, Mono 2.0 and .NET Compact Framework 3.5. 
It provides LINQ interface to layout of WinForms controls and 
composition of reactive values.
HomeWiki:
About

Linquid is a functional GUI library for .NET 3.5, Mono 2.0 and .NET Compact Framework 3.5.
It provides LINQ interface to layout of WinForms controls and
composition of reactive values.
Design of the library was inspired by Conal Elliott's Phooey.
